channel.title: Mac Mini on iHelio
channel.description: Recent content in Mac Mini on iHelio

item.title: How I Upgraded My Mac Mini Storage with an External SSD and Solved the Home Directory Issue
item.description: A couple of months ago, I had the brilliant idea to upgrade my Mac mini M2 by installing MacOS on an external M.2 SSD. For under 200 bucks, I went from a measly 250GB to a whopping 2TB. I was on cloud nine, reveling in my newfound digital real estate, until the other weekend when the system decided to crash my party by refusing to download upgrades due to a lack of space.
